snippet: The last work conceived by Pina Bausch, the choreographer celebrated in the Oscar-nominated documentary “Pina,” is coming to the Brooklyn Academy of Music this month.
abstract: Final work conceived by Pina Bausch, the choreographer celebrated in the Oscar-nominated documentary Pina, is coming to the Brooklyn Academy of Music for an eight-performance run; piece has taken on a new identity since Bausch's death as the last work of a 36-year career during which she created an entirely new form of dance.
lead_paragraph: The last work conceived by Pina Bausch, the choreographer celebrated in the Oscar-nominated documentary “Pina,” is coming to the Brooklyn Academy of Music this month.

headline.seo: Pina Bausch’s ‘Como el muguito’ at BAM
headline.main: The Swan Song of Pina Bausch
headline.print_headline: The Swan Song of Pina Bausch
